column4: im a bit of a noob when it comes to web programming and web servers, im trying to set up a personal wiki -- ive installed php5 and apache 2 and set up appropriate folders, it then tells me to; in my browser, go to localhost/apache2-default/pmwiki/pmwiki.php   and then i should get more instructions from that php file -- but firefox just tries to download it -- is that meant to happen?
looks like the apache server is not configured properly
hmmm, okay ty -- il go and do some more research
or there's a htaccess file corrupted
